name: VR Modern Wars: Advance under air raid
name_original: VR Modern Wars: Advance under air raid
description:
Under the bombardment of fighters in the Middle East battlefield, players need to cross the lines of defense of the enemy camp and reach the beam of light safely. In the process, it is not only necessary to avoid the enemy's air attack in an open battlefield without obstructions, but also to avoid the enemy's fort attack on the position. In order to ensure their own safety and successfully traverse the undulating sandy slopes to reach their destination, players can shoot as much as possible the fort that appears on the way.

movement:
The left handle trackpad controls the movement of the tank;
The right handle trackpad controls the movement of the turret
attack:
The left handle trigger fires a bullet;
The trigger on the right handle fires a cannonball;
menu:
The menu button can call out the menu, the right handle can change the click position, the trigger button can press the corresponding button, and the menu button can be pressed again to close the menu.
